metadata.title: CVE-2016-1249 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The DBD::mysql module before 4.039 for Perl, when using server-side prepared statement support, allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via vectors involving an unaligned number of placeholders in WHERE condition and output fields in SELECT expression.

criterions.comment: libdbd-mysql-perl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.039-1').
